column2: Death of Queen Victoria; end of Victorian Era
Assassination of William McKinley, Theodore Roosevelt becomes president
Wright brothers achieve first powered flight
USA begins construction of Panama Canal
Russo-Japanese War shifts balance of power
Einstein publishes Theory of Special Relativity
Universal suffrage first applied in Finland Parliament elections
Financial Panic leads to U.S. banking reform
Messina earthquake in southern Italy kills 70,000 people
Ford introduces Model T, enabling mass car ownership
Treaty of Versailles; League of Nations founded
Women gain right to vote (19th Amendment)
Wall Street Crash triggers Great Depression
Hitler becomes Chancellor; New Deal launched
Pearl Harbor attack; U.S. joins WWII
People’s Republic of China established; NATO formed
Brown v. Board of Education desegregates schools
Launch of Sputnik; start of Space Race
Cuban Revolution brings Castro to power
MLK’s “I Have a Dream” speech; JFK assassinated
Six-Day War reshapes Middle East borders
U.S. ends gold standard (Bretton Woods collapse)
OPEC oil embargo causes energy crisis
Fall of Saigon; Vietnam War ends
Death of Mao Zedong; end of Cultural Revolution
Iranian Revolution; Soviet invasion of Afghanistan
Tiananmen Square protests; Berlin Wall falls
Asian financial crisis; Hong Kong returns to China
NATO intervenes in Kosovo; Euro introduced (non-cash)
September 11 terrorist attacks on World Trade Center
Global financial crisis begins with housing market collapse
Beijing hosts Summer Olympics; symbol of China’s global rise

column3: Middle East & North Africa (Tunisia, Egypt, Libya)

column2: Edward Snowden leaks NSA surveillance documents
Brexit referendum: UK votes to leave EU
Black Lives Matter protests after George Floyd’s death
U.S. Capitol riot challenges peaceful power transfer
Taliban retake Afghanistan after U.S. withdrawal
AI technology (ChatGPT, generative models) revolutionizes tech industry
COP28 global climate conference focuses on fossil fuel phaseout
Global economic slowdown amid AI and energy transitions
